abstract: Family leave policies have become the subject of much discussion in the tech industry, and a number of top companies have increased the parental leave they offer.
snippet: Family leave policies have become the subject of much discussion in the tech industry, and a number of top companies have increased the parental leave they offer.
lead_paragraph: Facebook’s chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, said he planned to take two months of paternity leave after his daughter is born this year, amid a debate about work-life balance at technology companies.

headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Plans 2-Month Paternity Leave From Facebook
